name: Pretty Sure
description:
Have you ever found yourself laying in bed at 2am, eyes wide open, thinking about that one person? Thinking about how if you had just one perfect moment to express to them that the butterflies in your stomach was because of her... or him. Thinking about what would happen if you actually just said it out loud?

I have too...

This 2nd Edition of Pretty Sure is a hand-pulled screenprint soon to be featured in the upcoming TDC Annual Typography 30. 75 pieces have been printed, signed and numbered.

DIMENSIONS
19" × 25" 

STOCK
100# Cover Pop-Tone Wild Cherry Red Stock by French Paper Co. 

SHIPPING
Pretty Sure will travel by USPS Priority Mail in plenty of warm packaging (a sturdy 5" tube to maximize ruggedness and minimize curling) to protect her while she’s on her journey to her new home. If you would like her to travel a different way, email me and I will be happy to to discuss alternative shipping options.

name: You + Me (3rd Edition)
description:
As you can see, this diagram clearly states that when you and I are together it is seriously awesome!

3rd Edition is in the works! Stay Tuned!!

DIMENSIONS
19" × 25" 

STOCK
100# Cover Pop-Tone Sweet Tooth by French Paper Co. 

SHIPPING
You+Me will travel by USPS Priority Mail in plenty of warm packaging (a sturdy 5" tube to maximize ruggedness and minimize curling) to protect her while she’s on her journey to her new home. If you would like her to travel a different way, email me and I will be happy to to discuss alternative shipping options.

name: Hell Yeah!
description:
You ever have that surge of energy when everything goes just right… Well, I think this is a completely appropriate response, don’t you?… Hell yeah you do!

Hell Yeah! is a hand-pulled screenprint edition of 77 prints. Signed, numbered and each print being truly unique, this print is a must have!

DIMENSIONS
19" × 25"

STOCK
Pop-Tone Hot Fudge by French Paper Co.

SHIPPING
Hell Yeah! will travel by USPS Priority Mail in plenty of warm packaging (a sturdy 5" tube to maximize ruggedness and minimize curling) to protect her while she’s on her journey to her new home. If you would like her to travel a different way, email me and I will be happy to to discuss alternative shipping options.

name: Sit Back...
description:
In such a fast paced world, sometimes one needs to just stop and look around for a second; remember to really take things in and experience the moment. One needs to remind oneself to sit back and relax.

So trust me, take it easy once in a while, it’ll add extra beats to the ticker…

Sit Back… is a two-color letterpressed poster that was printed in 2 small runs. 40 in an Orange/Cyan combo and 35 in a Cyan/Fuschia. Each piece is signed and numbered.

DIMENSIONS
11.5" × 18"

STOCK
110# Crane Letra.

SHIPPING
Sit Back… will travel by USPS Priority Mail in plenty of warm packaging (a sturdy 5" tube to maximize ruggedness and minimize curling) to protect him while he’s on his journey to his new home. If you would like him to travel a different way, email me and I will be happy to to discuss additional shipping options.

If you love it, don’t be shy, leave a comment! It makes me feel all warm and fuzzy…

name: Octopolis
description:
What I think is really lurking in the East River…

This giclee print is a reproduction of a painting that I did at the beginning of the year. The print measures 11" × 14" and is printed on a very nice fine art paper by Crane Co. Each print is signed and dated on the back. Sorry the frame is not included.

SHIPPING
Should you choose to bring Octopolis home, I will happily and carefully pack her flat in lots of rigid padding to keep her warm and safe in her journey. If you would like her to travel a different way, email me and I, of course, will be happy to to discuss alternative shipping options.
